Instance.description: Structure containing a set of situation datas for a period of time.

TunableList.name: random_situations
TunableList.description: Situations in which remaining instantiated sims will attempt to be placed

TunableTuple.name: weight
TunableTuple.description: Weight for this situation. Used for random selection until all available sims are used.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

TunableList.name: required_situations
TunableList.description: Situations that will always attempt to run as long as required jobs are sufficiently filled.

TunableVariant.name: max_created
TunableVariant.description: Maximum number of this situation to create.

Tunable.name: count
Tunable.description: Maximum number of this situation to create.

TunableList.name: count_modifiers
TunableList.description: Reduce number of situations by 1 for every sim previously assigned (in this time period) to specified situation/job.

TunableList.name: start_any_time_loot
TunableList.description: A list of loot operations that will be given when this situation set starts regardless of whether it's at the start. (i.e. Even if user travelled to the lot mid period.)

TunableList.name: start_on_time_loot
TunableList.description: A list of loot operations that will be given if the situation set starts at the beginning of it's scheduled time. (i.e. Didn't travel to the lot mid period.)
